name: Cherry Fresh Designs
tagline: USING THE WEB TO GROW YOUR BUSINESS
description: CHERRY FRESH DESIGNS was formed to provide professional print and web-based services, ranging from branding strategies, custom web designs to fully functional e-commerce sites, SEO and more. We know that brand recognition is important to solidify and grow your online presence. We deliver awesome branding strategies including logos, graphics, exceptional web designs, e-commerce sites, mobile apps, digital marketing and much more to Philadelphia and the United States.
